class_notes: This course covers how fundamental analysis, valuation models, and portfolio optimization can be used for investing, both conceptually and practically. You will learn how to design an 'end-to-end' accounting-based investing system from concept to implementation, including state-of-the-art accounting-based valuation models, innovative methods such as machine learning and artificial intelligence, and the coding skills required to calibrate these models for forecasting and prediction.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
schedule_location: TTh 1pm-2:15pm in Goizueta Foundation Ctr W330
